Control Name: 2.5. Ensure ASC Default policy setting 'Monitor Endpoint Protection' is not 'Disabled'
Control Statement: When this setting is enabled, it recommends endpoint protection be provisioned for all Windows virtual machines to help identify and remove viruses, spyware, and other malicious software
